attributes.action: to convene a public inquiry into the circumstances surrounding the sudden closure of the big green gathering
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The sudden closure of the big green gathering marks an abrupt change in policy towards festivals and festival culture in general.

Many people face financial ruin due to the the extreme action taken by the mendip council and police in cancelling this peacefull event at unfairly short notice for what have been quoted by them as 'political' reasons.

We would like to know what these 'political' reasons are , who ordered this and why they waited until people where financially committed to the event.
